[@microsoft/fast-element](../fast-element/index.html) &gt; [PartialHTMLDirectiveDefinition](../fast-element.partialhtmldirectivedefinition/index.html) &gt; [aspected](../fast-element.partialhtmldirectivedefinition.aspected/index.html)

## PartialHTMLDirectiveDefinition.aspected property

Indicates whether the directive needs access to template contextual information such as the sourceAspect, targetAspect, and aspectType.

**Signature:**

```typescript
aspected?: boolean;
```
